DPR Dukung Nadiem Makarim Jalankan Pembaruan Pendidikan
07 Nov 2019, 01:51 by Antara, Yudono Yanuar
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Menteri Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan Nadiem Makarim mendapatkan dukungan Komisi X Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Republik Indonesia untuk menjalankan visi dan misi Presiden Joko Widodo.
"Saya lebih optimistis lagi setelah mendapatkan dukungan dari DPR Komisi X untuk bisa melaksanakan lompatan perbaikan, inovasi di dunia pendidikan kita untuk mencapai Indonesia maju," ujar Nadiem dalam keterangan tertulis di Jakarta, Rabu, 6 November.
Dalam rapat kerja perdananya dengan Komisi X, Mendikbud Nadiem memaparkan lima arahan Presiden yang bertajuk "Arahan Presiden untuk Menciptakan SDM Unggul" yaitu pendidikan karakter, deregulasi dan debirokratisasi, meningkatkan investasi dan inovasi, penciptaan lapangan kerja, dan pemberdayaan teknologi.
"Kita harus bisa menciptakan institusi pendidikan yang bukan hanya mencetak tenaga kerja saja, tetapi juga bisa menciptakan lapangan pekerjaan," kata Mendikbud.
Teknologi, menurut Mendikbud akan digunakan sebagai alat penciptaan pemerataan, khususnya untuk menjadikan daerah terpencil maupun kota besar mendapatkan dukungan yang sama untuk pembelajaran.
Menurut Mendikbud, teknologi akan menghadirkan efisiensi, efektivitas, dan transparansi, baik anggaran maupun waktu.
"Teknologi yang akan kita berdayakan untuk membantu pendidikan kita. Bukan menggantikan pembelajaran, karena sampai kapanpun tidak bisa pembelajaran (itu) tergantikan oleh teknologi," tuturnya.
Para anggota Komisi X berharap proses transisi bidang pendidikan tinggi kembali ke Kemendikbud dapat berjalan lancar dan tidak terlalu menyita waktu.
"Saya berharap restrukturisasi akibat penggabungan kembali Dikti ke Kemendikbud dapat berjalan segera," kata Ketua Komisi X, Syaiful Huda.
Dalam rapat kerja, para Anggota Komisi X juga menitipkan target penyelesaian guru honorer, program pemenuhan kebutuhan guru, serta peningkatan kesejahteraan guru dan tenaga pendidik.
Anggota Komisi X dari Fraksi Partai Demokrasi Indonesia Perjuangan (PDIP), My Esti Wijayati, kembali menegaskan pentingnya kejelasan aturan mengenai alokasi anggaran fungsi pendidikan pada Anggaran Pendapatan dan Belanja Daerah (APBD).
Anggota Komisi X DPR dari Fraksi PAN, Desy Ratnasari juga menyoroti pentingnya kesetaraan gender dalam kesempatan untuk bersekolah atau melanjutkan pendidikan antara anak perempuan dan laki-laki.
Selain itu, para legislator juga meminta Mendikbud untuk melakukan revitalisasi Lembaga Pendidikan dan Tenaga Kependidikan (LPTK) agar dapat meningkatkan kualitas guru di Tanah Air.

DPR Supports Nadiem Makarim to Run Education Reform
Nov 7 2019, 01:51 by Antara, Yudono Yanuar
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Minister of Education and Culture Nadiem Makarim has the support of the Commission X of the House of Representatives of the Republic of Indonesia to carry out the vision and mission of President Joko Widodo.
"I am even more optimistic after getting support from the House of Representatives Commission X to be able to carry out a leap of improvement, innovation in our education world to achieve advanced Indonesia," Nadiem said in a written statement in Jakarta, Wednesday, November 6.
In his inaugural work meeting with Commission X, Minister of Education and Culture Nadiem explained five presidential directives entitled "President's Directive to Create Superior Human Resources" namely character education, deregulation and bureaucratization, increasing investment and innovation, creating jobs, and empowering technology.
"We must be able to create educational institutions that not only create employment, but also can create jobs," said the Minister of Education and Culture.
Technology, according to the Minister of Education and Culture will be used as a tool for creating equity, especially to make remote areas and big cities get the same support for learning.
According to the Minister of Education and Culture, technology will bring efficiency, effectiveness and transparency, both in budget and time.
"The technology that we will empower to help our education. Not replace learning, because until whenever it cannot be (it) learning is replaced by technology," he said.
The members of Commission X hope that the transition process in the field of higher education back to the Ministry of Education and Culture can run smoothly and not take too much time.
"I hope that the restructuring due to the merger of Dikti back to the Ministry of Education and Culture can proceed soon," said Chairman of Commission X, Syaiful Huda.
In the work meeting, the members of Commission X also entrusted the target of honorary teacher completion, a program to meet the needs of teachers, and to improve the welfare of teachers and educators.
Member of Commission X of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle (PDIP) Faction, My Esti Wijayati, reiterated the importance of clarity of the rules regarding the budget allocation for the education function in the Regional Revenue and Expenditure Budget (APBD).
DPR Commission X member from the PAN faction, Desy Ratnasari also highlighted the importance of gender equality in the opportunity to go to school or continue education between girls and boys.
In addition, the legislators also asked the Minister of Education and Culture to revitalize the Educational Institution and Education Personnel (LPTK) in order to improve the quality of teachers in the country.
